channel.title: Confidential-Vm on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Confidential-Vm on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: AMD v6 confidential VMs in new regions for January 2026
item.description:
Azure DCa/ECa v6 AMD-based confidential VMs are now generally available in 11 additional regions.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: Retirement: Confidential VM SKUs DCesv5, DCedsv5, ECesv5, ECedsv5 SKUs
item.description:
Microsoft is retiring the Confidential VM SKUs DCesv5, DCedsv5, ECesv5, and ECedsv5. These SKUs will be succeeded by the next-generation DCesv6 and ECesv6 sizes, which were recently announced in public preview.

  • Source: Azure Updates
